divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking our 2 small dogs out to go potty in my back yard then looked up and saw a long bright Bar flying low across the north clear sky for about 5 seconds then poof! and there was a smokey trail at 8:15pm the Dogs barked and scared.Never saw a Bar like light like this before! very different just white and very bright!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jefferson
There were no other sightings in Jefferson on or around November 21st 2013
Summary: a Bright long Bar traveling across a clear north sky above my back yard field then poof left then poof left a smokey trail
